duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage delivery of projects involving software package implementation and custom development for clients.
Leverage expert knowledge across Project Management methodologies to coach and mentor the project team.
Manage the administration of assigned projects including project definition, project status reporting, project quality, and project staffing.
Support the sales efforts of Asset Management related services.
Provide subject matter expertise regarding key decisions related to industry and/or functional area.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
